short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save money and support your favorite creators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
brelly is a free browser extension that saves you money and supports your favorite content creators when you shop online.

Your favorite content creators make money through sponsorships. Save money and help them make money by using Brelly.

How it Works:
1. Watch and listen to your favorite videos and podcasts.
2. Shop and click on the brelly 'Save' button when it appears.
3. That's it! You've saved money and supported your favorite creators.

What makes brelly special?
Brelly will save you money when you shop and sign up for websites accross the internet, but there are a lot of extensions available that will save you similar amounts of money. What makes Brelly special is that we pass almost all the commission money back to the creators that you know and love. So along with the savings that you're getting, you're also helping to support content creators make more wonderful content. Its a Win-Win!
